column4: Hello, if I wanted to Migrate some Word documents / pictures over to my Linux parition, how would I do that now?  It didn't show me anything that I could bring over when it was installing, so could someone help me figure out how to do that now that I have everything working good?
is your windows partition not mounted, and placed on the desktop
he means, why not just access them without actually copying them over.
Ok, then how would I do that... it is still my personal preference, but I would still be interesting in learning how to do either option.
